original_text: People have told me that you continue to trust in the Lord Jesus. They have told me that you love all God's people. Because I have heard these good things about you,
korean_text: 이로 말미암아 주 예수 안에서 너희 믿음과 모든 성도를 향한 사랑을 나도 듣고

sentences.original_text: that you continue to trust in the Lord Jesus
that you love all God's people
Because I have heard these good things about you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에 대한 이 좋은 것들을 들었기 때문에
